item.title: [PI] GivePkP Command Help. & Offline Problem
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

		                        if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepkp")) {
                                try {        
                                        String[] playerToG = playerCommand.split(" ");
                                        for(int i = 0; i < Server.playerHandler.players.length; i++) {
                                                if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
                                                        if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG[1])) {
								Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
                                                                c2.pkPoints+=100;
								c2.sendMessage("You have received 100 PK Points from "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName));
                                                                c.sendMessage("You have given "+Misc.optimizeText(c2.playerName)+" 100 PK Points.");  
                                                                //c2.disconnected = true;
                                                        } 
						}
                                        }
                                } catch(Exception e) {
                                        c.sendMessage("Usage: ::givepkp [Player]");
                                }
                        }

item.title: [PI] GivePkP Command Help. & Offline Problem
item.dc:creator: @SwagScape317 SwagScape317
item.description:
@SwagScape317 wrote:

Hey MoparScape, First things first.
Ive been trying to make a ::givepkp command for my server. Heres my current code
My pkp saves as pk-Points = 100 but for some reason the commands wont recognize it.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepkp")) { try { String playerToG = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].pkPoints+= 450; c.sendMessage("You have given "+Misc.optimizeText(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)+" <img=1><col=255>Moderator"); Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

And second, When a players online, It always says “Player Must Be Offline.” When i try to promote, givedonor ect.

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveadmin")) { try { String playerToG = playerCommand.substring(8); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("You have given "+Misc.optimizeText(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)+" <img=2><col=255>Administrator"); Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
